data.event: On October 29, 1889, President Ulises Heureaux declared the town a municipality.
To this day, October 29th is celebrated in Altamira with municipal festivities.
In its earliest days, Altamira functioned as a set of large agricultural ranches, populated by families transferred there from nearby conucos (small farms).

event.title: became a part of the Province of Santiago by Law No. 40 of 1845

data.event: During the period of the Annexation, Altamira became a part of the Province of Santiago by Law No. 40 of 1845.
